headline: Podcast: Nasdaq Leads U.S. Stocks to New Records
summary: Nvidia's investment in OpenAI boosted tech stocks and the Nasdaq Composite Index Monday. Plus: Pfizer agreed to acquire GLP-1 maker Metsera. And Oracle named new co-CEOs. ? Listen to the WSJ Minute Briefing podcast.

headline: Pfizer joining GLP-1 race: How Novo & Eli Lilly compare
summary: Pfizer (PFE) is entering the weight-loss drug race with its acquisition of Metsera. BMO Capital Markets managing director of biopharma equity research Evan Seigerman Yahoo Finance Head of News Myles Udland on Market Domination to discuss how investors can play the GLP-1 trade in the pharmaceutical sector. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination.
